summary:
Soul Armor II 
New light and heavy Armor for CBBE
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3]Soul Armor II New light and heavy Armor for CBBE[/size] 
for females only
video link https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sy0P7YX27ws
 
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sy0P7YX27ws[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rjJE8Ub.jpg[/IMG]
New light and heavy armor version

includes:
cuiras,boots,hood,gauntlets

2k HD textures with transparent chainmail
 
Status:

Light version
same as Glass

Heavy version
same as Ebony

light version: 
to find under the glass category 


[size=12]heavy set in now avaliable[/size]
heavy version:
to find under the ebony category

can be made and upgraded at every forge.

You need: 
leather stripes
Steel ingots
Leather
Filed black soul gem

Install with NMM or copy and paste files in the right folder

Requirements
=========================================================================================
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition v3.2.3 recommended

Log
-----------------------
create now a complete set 

credits and permissionÂ´s

Newermind43
for the \\\"so hot\\\" armor
	
Fetish Latex CatSuit by Turbosnowy 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13178

Scouter Corset by NEO by Meister aka Neovinci
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18912

Diano by NPR/Kurese
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14670

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

Nikita
for the box mesh
________________________________________________________________

it was a lot of work to make this,
so please if you like it post your pictures.
Thank you

have fun.


check also my other mods i made
